title: Get Page Images
excerpt: A chrome extension that, when run, grabs all images on the page, opens a new page, displays the images, and allows the user to easily download them by clicking on each image. It's currently got over 100+ installs on the Chrome Web Store and multiple 5 start reviews.

title: Worlde Clone
excerpt: An e2e clone of the popular game Worlde. This project was built with React, NX, and a backend API built with Nest.

title: Caption Calculator
excerpt: A tool for customers to calculate the number of captioning minutes they would need to purchase for their programs.

title: Comparison Tool
excerpt: A tool, similar to Apple's iphone comparison tool, that allows customers to compare up to three aircraft at a time (Total Passengers, Max Cruise Speed, Cabin Length, ect).

title: Honey CRM
excerpt: Rebuilt Honey CRM's (Now Glass Hive) website in React with Gatsby.js and Netlify CMS. Plugged into Stripe's web API to process payments from new clients. This is still a live project and they have made some changes since I left.

title: Ad Block - Quora
excerpt: A Chrome extension that filters out promoted posts and ads on Quora.

title: Ad Block - Reddit
excerpt: A Chrome extension that filters out promoted posts and ads on Reddit.

title: SynthDigital
excerpt: Rebuilt SynthDigital's website in React with Gatsby.js and Netlify CMS.

title: RedRock
excerpt: This is a site I built during my time at TRIDigital for a company called RedRock IS. I built this site using Wordpress, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I also used a few plugins to help with the functionality of the site. This is still a live site and they have made very minor changes since I developed it.

title: Compass MPS
excerpt: This is a site I built during my time at TRIDigital for a company called Compass MSP. I built this site using Wordpress, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I also used a few plugins to help with the functionality of the site. The site is active, but they have made changes to it after I left, so take it with a grain of salt.

excerpt: This is a site I built during my time at TRIDigital for a company called Fidelus. I built this site using Wordpress, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I also used a few plugins to help with the functionality of the site. The site is no longer active and was not on github so all I have left are these images.

title: GoodReads Clone
excerpt: A book organization app (Similar to Google's GoodReads) built with React and Redux during my React Nano Degree program at Udacity.

title: React ToDo App
excerpt: A MERN stack ToDo list app and an API (https://github.com/ghughes13/API)  that will store your ToDo list items in a MongoDB database. There is no current demo for this project, and it needs to be redeployed.

title: Would You Rather
excerpt: A would you rather game app built with React and Redux during my rect nano degree program at Udacity.

title: Tic-Tak-Toe
excerpt: A Tic-Tak-Toe app built with vanilla JavaScript, CSS and HTML

title: Paginating List
excerpt: A quick view of industry specific problems solved with design by the awesome team at Keystroke.

title: TRIDigital
excerpt: Rebuilt TRIDigital's website in React with Gatsby.js and Netlify CMS. (No longer active site)

title: Freight Train
excerpt: Worked with the team at Freight Train and a designer to build a custom Wordpress site for their company. It's fully responsive, and has functioning forms.

title: RainTech
excerpt: Collaborated with the team at RainTech and a designer to develop a custom WordPress site for their company. The site is fully responsive and features functional forms.

title: FitUp
excerpt: Worked closely with the team at FitUp and a designer to create a custom WordPress site for their company. The site is fully responsive and includes fully functional forms.
